summary: A book found in cave beneath Helgan Keep leads to a powerful weapon from a foreign land...
descriptionHtml: There is a legend of a weapon forged in the deserts of Hammerfell called Matekhet-Esh: A curved sword that harnesses the power of an inferno, and sharper than most blades. In awe over such craftsmanship and in fear that many would use such a weapon to attain power, a Dark Elf named Jawshya Vvyaighd has hidden the sword somewhere in Skyrim as well as a clue to find it. A book he wrote lies beneath Helgan Keep, under the protection of a bear that made this cave her home. But the book only leads to clues as to the true location of Matekhet-Esh...
author: Mad Wolf
